_source.short_desc: Simplify membership management with MemberClicks! Trusted by over 3,000 member-based organizations who love our client service!
_source.long_desc:
Simplify membership management with MemberClicks! Our all-in-one solution helps your association, chamber, or association management company engage your members and increase revenue. Make use of powerful features to save time, grow your membership, generate more revenue, improve communication, build your community, and understand your members.  

Over 3,000 member-based organizations in North America trust MemberClicks to fulfill their missions.
_source.pricing_details: Pricing is based on the number of member profiles in your database.  We offer both monthly and annual payment options.  For more details, see the link to our pricing page above.
_source.target_audience: Midsized associations and chambers of commerce (staff of 2-20), and AMCs use MemberClicks to engage members, grow revenue, save time, and reduce stress.

media.caption: Main Dashboard - A high level overview of your association and activity
Payment Management - payments, invoicing & payment processor details
Events & Financials Dashboard - Easily see upcoming and historical information in one easy-to-use solution
Job Board - Build membership value and generate revenue through a branded job board
Exceptional Customer Support - Reach us by phone, live chat, email and our 24/7 video and help sections

related_products.short_desc: Organizers of events of all sizes use Eventbrite to power their live experience.
related_products.features: Eventbrite is a ticketing and event technology platform that helps businesses organize and sell tickets to events online  while helping people discover events that fuel their passions. From workshops to concerts to conferences to world-renowned film and music festivals, Eventbrite houses events of all shapes and sizes. Eventbrites powerful platform, which can be accessed online or via mobile apps, scales from basic registration and ticketing to a fully featured event management platform.

related_products.short_desc: GoTo Webinar powers millions of webinars each year and is now part of GoTo Connect, all-in-one communications software built for SMBs.
related_products.features: GoTo Webinar is trusted by more customers than any other online webinar solution and powers millions of webinars each year. Whether you use webinars for marketing, training, or corporate communications, GoTo Webinar puts the fun back into webinars with reliable technology that's super simple to use. Get the features, integrations and analytics you need to engage your audience and make personal connections that drive your business.

related_products.short_desc: Airtable is the database that anyone can use with a beautiful spreadsheet interface.
related_products.features: Airtable is the relational database for the rest of us. With a spreadsheet-like interface that anyone can use, realtime collaboration, and rich features like file attachments and reporting, Airtable is the friendliest modern database.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based software with event app, event registration, event marketing, and event management for in-person/virtual/hybrid events.
related_products.features:
Whova is an all-in-one event management solution that consists of an award winning event app, efficient online registration, powerful event marketing, and time-saving event management tools. 
Whova has won the Event Technology Award for 5 years in a row and has powered over 30,000 in-person and virtual/hybrid events for all kinds of organizations in over 100 countries, including American Express, Microsoft, Hilton, Lego, IKEA, L'Oreal, American Marketing Association, Harvard University, and NASA

related_products.short_desc: A complete event marketing and management platform that handles the entire event lifecycle (in-person & virtual) from start to finish.
related_products.features: Cvent delivers an all-in-one event platform for any event, and every event. Our platform simplifies the management of each stage of the event lifecycle while giving you the data and insights you need to maximize your value. Whether in-person, virtual, or hybrid, you'll have a single platform with everything you need to find suppliers, engage attendees, maximize sponsor value, and capture important event data.

related_products.short_desc: A number of companies use Bitrix24 as free event management software, since it comes with all the necessary tools for the job.
related_products.features: A number of companies use Bitrix24 as free event management software, since it comes with all the necessary tools for the job. First, there is CRM and client management module that lets you create quotes and invoices, send emails and manage vendors. Second there are shared calendars that let you schedule and book multiple venues. Third, there?s a project management module and task templates that organizers use to manage ground crews.

related_products.short_desc:
Everything you need to manage your event business: proposals, contracts, payments, and more. 

Use code "ONLY1" to start for $1/mo.
related_products.features:
HoneyBook makes it easy for event managers to book more clients, manage projects, and get paid-all in one place.

With proposals, invoices, contracts, payments, and scheduling at your fingertips, you have everything you need to give clients a great experience.

Get your first 6 months for just $1/mo with code "ONLY1".

related_products.short_desc: Tripleseat is a catering and event management platform for restaurants, hotels, and unique venues.
related_products.features: Tripleseat is a catering and event management platform for restaurants, hotels, and unique venues that will increase sales and streamline the booking process. It is the first web-based system created by hospitality event managers for hospitality event managers. Since 2008 Tripleseat has taken the restaurant business by storm providing solutions and simplifying the event process from start to finish. Over 2,500 venues and 18,000+ event industry expert trust Tripleseat.

related_products.short_desc: Create a beautiful event website in minutes. Trusted by more than 300,000 people worldwide, including planners from Nike and MIT.
related_products.features:
Create a beautiful event website in minutes. 

Build an event website, collect registrations, sell tickets, send invites, track attendees, and promote your event online. Reliable and secure. 

Trusted by more than 500,000 people worldwide, including planners from Nike, MIT and Refinery29.

related_products.short_desc: The eSPACE Work Order Management module is the most comprehensive facility management software on the market!
related_products.features:
eSPACE has best-in-class customer service and ongoing development support, Our Work Order Management module is the most comprehensive facility management software on the market! Some of our key features includes:

- Work Orders and Assignments & Inventory Control
- Robust Reporting Options & Equipment Tracking
- Preventive Maintenance
- Vendor Portal

Take us on a free test drive for 30 days or request a free demo today!

related_products.short_desc: Event management software for fundraising including silent auctions, live auctions, online bidding, mobile bidding & more!
related_products.features: Simple, Affordable, Powerful software for in person, hybrid or virtual events.  Supports live auctions, paper or online/mobile silent auction bidding, custom ticketing, seating management, custom color branding, donation bundling with multiple high resolution photos, guest self-checkout, monetary donations, marketing communications, detailed reporting, sponsor recognition and more. Our best in class customer service is FREE via phone or email. We're here to help!

similar_products.short_desc: Hearty technology, lightweight package. We combine serious event management software with a platform designed for regular humans.
similar_products.features: Swoogo is the #1 event management software that empowers event organizers to run effective in-person, virtual, and hybrid events. We provide a platform that creates a satisfying experience for you to build ROI positive events on repeat for your attendees. Our platform includes UNLIMITED events & registrations , personalized registration flows, built-in attendee analytics, seamless CRM and payment integrations, website+email marketing tools with automation, & best-in-class customer support.

similar_products.short_desc: GoTo Webinar powers millions of webinars each year and is now part of GoTo Connect, all-in-one communications software built for SMBs.

similar_products.features: Webex Events (formerly Socio) is the end-to-end event management & experience platform powering immersive, intuitive, and inclusive virtual, hybrid, and in-person events. With features like registration, ticketing, schedules, live streaming, & simulive; attendee engagement tools like games, polls, chat, & sponsorship showcase; and in-person products like onsite check-in & badge printing, lead retrieval & live display.

similar_products.short_desc: A complete event marketing and management platform that handles the entire event lifecycle (in-person & virtual) from start to finish.

Our platform simplifies the management of each stage of the event lifecycle while giving you the data and insights you need to maximize your value. Whether in-person, virtual, or hybrid, you'll have a single platform with everything you need to find suppliers, engage attendees, maximize sponsor value, and capture important event data.

similar_products.short_desc: From budget planning to event registration and coordinating with vendors, monday marketer can handle your entire event operation.
similar_products.features: From budget planning to event registration and coordinating with vendors, monday marketer can handle your entire event operation. Monitor event registration, encourage cross team collaboration, track performance and attendance with customizable dashboards and more.  Assign jobs to different colleagues so everyone knows exactly what to do in what priority. From pre-event registration to post-event feedback, organizations can monitor conferences, company events, webinars and more in real-time.

similar_products.short_desc: Event management suite with registration, ratings, mobile app, payments, speaker mgmt, space layout, and more. Live & virtual events.
similar_products.features: AWARD-WINNING PLATFORM. Flat, predictable pricing. All features all of the time. Unlimited events including VIRTUAL events. Unlimited users. No credit card fees. Modern and easy to use for event hosts and attendees. Website creation, customized registration, free web-based mobile app, session ratings, speaker ratings, payment processing, speaker/agenda management, space layout, CEU's, etc.   Flexible configuration options serve virtually any event business model.  Rated tops by Capterra!

similar_products.short_desc: Whether hybrid, virtual or in-person, eShow provides the professional tools and web-based solutions necessary for event management team
similar_products.features:
Whether hybrid, virtual or in-person, eShow provides the professional tools and web-based solutions necessary for event management teams worldwide. Founded in 1996, eShow has helped Event Managers run thousands of events worldwide with tasks including registration, mobile apps, event websites, RFID, badge printing, abstract collection and so much more! 

When you choose the eShow product(s) that fit your needs, you tap into a powerful engine that no single-function supplier can hope to match.

similar_products.short_desc: The only event platform specifically designed to decrease stress and save you time. Plus 24/7 human support is included!
similar_products.features: The only event platform specifically designed to decrease stress and save you time. Drive engagement and measurable ROI while organizing everything within one platform. Our premise is that technology should make your life easier so that you can focus on creating unique experiences.

similar_products.short_desc: Build every in-person, virtual, and hybrid event with Bizzabo's next-generation event management platform - The Event Experience OS.
similar_products.features: Bizzabo's next-generation event management platform powers immersive in-person, virtual, and hybrid experiences for the world's leading brands. The Bizzabo Event Experience OS is a data-rich open platform that empowers Event Experience Leaders to manage events, engage audiences, activate communities, and deliver powerful business outcomes.

similar_products.short_desc: Manage your portfolio of meetings and events with ease, whether online, hybrid, or in-person; paid or free; private or public.
similar_products.features:
Attendease is an award-winning event management software used by mid-market/ enterprise organizations to manage a portfolio of meetings and events from end-to-end, whether online, hybrid, or in-person; paid or free; private or public.

Used by names such as Adobe, NBC, and Autodesk, our versatile software simplifies the complexity of managing events with a powerful suite of tools that ensures all details are addressed, changes are simple, and repetitive tasks are automated.

similar_products.short_desc: Sell tickets online and host your most successful event ever with TicketSpice.
similar_products.features:
Host your most successful event ever with TicketSpice. 

TicketSpice is easy to use, highly customizable, and unbelievably affordable. At just $0.99 per ticket, you'll save thousands, while offering a seamlessly simple ticketing experience. 

TicketSpice is flexible and feature rich, offering full branding control, timed ticketing, reserved seating, mobile scanning, box office, merchandise options, and more. 

If you're frustrated by expensive and restrictive ticketing systems that put their log

similar_products.short_desc: SpotMe is an event engagement solution tailored for companies looking to host high-touch events.
similar_products.features: SpotMe is an event engagement solution tailored for companies looking to host high-touch events. All event management, video production and app building tools are included, directly from your browser. The solution is suitable for simple webinars to sophisticated events with high production values. Forrester and G2 say SpotMe is a leader due to high engagement capabilities and deep customization and flexibility.

similar_products.short_desc: A comprehensive event management software that empowers organizers to plan, promote, and run online and in-person events.
similar_products.features: Zoho Backstage is all-in-one event management software to plan and run in-person, virtual, and hybrid event experiences from beginning to end with greater efficiency and impact. Right from designing an event website, selling tickets, and marketing an event, to communicating with attendees, presenting sessions, and analyzing an event's performance, Zoho Backstage has everything you need to grow your event and accelerate its success.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Catering software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Catering tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Catering software manages business functions for the catering, event planning, and banquet management industries. Catering software provides an integrated solution for coordinating essential business processes including client details, locations, scheduling, inventory management, menu planning, waitstaff coordination, and payroll, as well as marketing and budgeting functions. Catering tools can include document management functionality to help track proposals, deposits, contracts, and client histories.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Conference software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Conference tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Conference software automates promotion, registration, and organization of live or online conferences.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Event Check In software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Event Check In tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Event Check In software helps significantly speed up the check in process at conferences, performances, and other events. This type of software can be deployed on mobile devices, such as smartphones and tablets, as well as kiosks, and often provides badge printing capabilities. Many organizations use Event Check In software to capture attendee information for lead generating purposes.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Live Streaming software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Live Streaming tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Live Streaming software allows organizations to broadcast live event feeds over the internet and engage with their target audience.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Meeting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Meeting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Meeting software enables teams to coordinate, schedule, conduct, and participate in collaborative meetings.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mobile Event Apps software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mobile Event Apps tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mobile Event Apps enable event organizers to consistently distribute important event information to the attendees in real time and facilitate networking among attendees.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Registration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Registration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Registration software automates the process of registering for conferences, meetings, classes, and other events. These applications offer a customizable solution for attendance tracking and event or meeting registration tasks. They also provide tools for processing payments either in advance or onsite, as well as donation collection and volunteer coordination features. Registration solutions also offer a variety of self-service functions for event attendees such as online registration, content delivery, and fee payment. Registration software is related to Event Management software and Training software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Ticketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Ticketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Ticketing software manages and automates online, kiosk, and box office ticketing for special events, theaters, parks, festivals, fairs, travel, and other activities. These applications help manage seat selections, event management, exhibitor data, performer assignments and locations, as well as online and onsite payment processing. Ticketing solutions also often integrate other business processes such as inventory control, transaction control, fulfillment history and sales tracking. Ticketing software is related to Event software, Registration software and Kiosk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Venue Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Venue Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Venue Management solutions aim to help event planners with marketing and scheduling of their facilities, ensuring that appropriate services and resources are provided for each event, and that the facility's capacity is optimally utilized.

_source.short_desc: Simplify membership management with MemberClicks; the all-in-one solution for staff who need to save time and grow their membership.

Engage members with email nurturing, online learning, job postings, and more. Today, over 3,000 clients across North America trust MemberClicks to fulfill their missions.
_source.pricing_details: Pricing is based on the number of member profiles in your database.  We offer both monthly and annual payment options.  For more details, see the link to our pricing page above.
_source.target_audience: Midsized associations and chambers of commerce (staff of 2-20), and AMCs use MemberClicks to engage members, grow revenue, save time, and reduce stress.

related_products.short_desc: Manage memberships & waivers, get booked 24/7, seamlessly process payments, send marketing emails & run reports. Starts at $25/month.
related_products.features: Use our all-in-one membership management software & app to manage and grow your business. Get booked & paid 24/7. Stay safe with 100% contactless check-in & checkout. Advertise your virtual and in-person classes on the Vagaro Marketplace. Reduce no-shows with automated reminders. Manage classes and memberships on any device. Send waivers and forms. Vagaro Pro is the most downloaded/reviewed Apple & Android App. Prices start @ $25/month. Sign up for a Free 1 Month Trial.

related_products.short_desc: Squarespace is the all-in-one platform to build a beautiful website, online store, or portfolio.
related_products.features: Squarespace is the all-in-one platform to build a beautiful online presence. Look like an expert right from the start with award-winning templates for your website, online store, or portfolio. Customize the design to fit your personal style and professional needs. Get found in search by more people with powerful SEO tools. Learn where your website traffic is coming from, what your visitors are looking for, and how they're interacting with your content or products with in-depth Analytics tools.

related_products.short_desc: Mindbody wellness business management software is tailored to businesses that need business and membership management systems.
related_products.features: Mindbody empowers your members to own their wellness experience. From member profiles and automated reminders to self check-in, your all-in-one software will keep everyone moving. Plus, with a custom app, members can update their info and schedule on the go?from the comfort of your brand. Manage and grow your community with ease. Schedule your free demo today.

related_products.short_desc: Affordable, All-In-One Solution to streamline website management,  membership dues, email marketing and more. Try a Demo!
related_products.features:
---- TRY OUR 7-DAY FREE TRIAL:
https://www.brilliantdirectories.com/trial  ----

Brilliant Directories offers an Affordable, All-In-One Member Management Solution to streamline all aspects of your membership website or association.  A complete, turn-key solution with quick setup and free, unlimited support from real people. Includes website design, online payment processing, multi-level memberships, past due monitoring, premium member's only content, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Track donors, donations and pledges for your church.  Accept online donations (integrated with most online giving providers).
related_products.features: "Save time and get more done, with fewer headaches." Easily keep track of your members, dues, contributions, pledges and more... Starts at $47.98 (one-time cost, no monthly fees; no attendance tracking, accounting or payroll) Print or email yearly tax receipts and quarterly statements. Print membership photo directory.  Share data like web-based software without the monthly fee, using DropBox or Google Drive.  Exports data to QuickBooks.  PC or Mac.

related_products.short_desc: Membership Management Software for board volunteers who want to grow their membership while saving time!
related_products.features: Want to grow your membership? Let StarChapter manage your membership data and increase retention rates so, you have more time for outreach. The software combines emails, event registration, membership, website design, and payment processing. Our StarChapter Project Manager will set up your service with you, coordinate the project for you, and train users even when the board transitions. Get access to 24/7 online technical support and industry resources.

related_products.short_desc: Easily manage your members, process payments, send out emails, register event attendees, create a website and more.
related_products.features: WildApricot is a complete membership management system, designed to fit your organizations needs. Easily manage your contacts, process payments, send out emails, register event attendees, create a website and more. With a self serve design and a user friendly interface, you have the freedom to customize every aspect of your membership management system. If you need help at any step of the way, our support team and community of experts are ready to help guide you and share their best practices.

related_products.short_desc: Increase engagement & revenue with a sophisticated membership management solution designed to support both nonprofits & associations.

Increase engagement & drive more revenue with Neon CRM, a sophisticated membership management solution designed to support both nonprofits and associations.

Build better relationships with event and experience management, activity tracking, marketing tools, and more!

Put your members in control with a member log-in portal to check their membership status, a custom member directory, and exclusive content. 

Ready for a more intuitive approach to member management?

related_products.short_desc: The complete front office and back office for your club or association: website, member database, events, forums, and much more.
related_products.features: ClubExpress is the economical Internet-based solution for smaller professional and trade associations (25-5000 members). ClubExpress combines your association web site with the membership database, online member signups/renewals/expirations, event calendar & registration, credit-card processing, membership directory, committees, forums, documents, interests, benefits, etc. We use state-of-the-art security, there's no advertising and associations own their data at all times.

related_products.short_desc: Online booking, resource scheduling, lead generation, and reporting solution for every business.
related_products.features: An all-in-one solution for your business! We feature a sophisticated scheduler for all your appointments and classes, email marketing, merchant processing, payroll, reputation management, robust reporting, a rewards program, and many more features. There are no pricey add-on fees to embed your schedule into your site, generate reviews, send emails/SMS notifications, rewards program, marketing automations, or anything else. WellnessLiving was built by our customers, for our customers!

similar_products.short_desc: Stop juggling multiple software - Simplify your membership management system with Member365.
similar_products.features:
Member365 combines the functionality of your email campaign manager, financial software, and CRM to create a platform custom-made for Membership Managers.

Automate busy work to spend less time managing member data, and more time understanding member needs. Create email campaigns in seconds by building lists from your Member365 CRM. Understand who is likely to churn, and more, with Engagement Analytics.

With Member365, your work is about managing members, not just their data.

similar_products.short_desc: Unlock the potential of your community with the most flexible and powerful all-in-one solution for community management and engagement.
similar_products.features: Unlock the potential of your community with Hivebrite, the most advanced all-in-one community management and engagement platform. Easy to set up and fully branded to match your colors, Hivebrite helps you build brand engagement and create opportunities for your private community. Manage your member database, centralize the communication with your members, create events and collect online memberships, all from a single user-friendly interface.

similar_products.short_desc: YourMembership is an affordable, all-in-one member management software built for small to mid-sized associations and nonprofits.
similar_products.features: YourMembership empowers associations, nonprofits and other member-based organizations to deliver more value to their members while streamlining administrative processes. Built for small to mid-sized organizations, the cloud-based membership management software is a comprehensive solution including: membership management, event management, e-Commerce, payments, email marketing, online community, advanced dashboards, and more!

similar_products.short_desc: SaaS solution that provides an organization with a member database, website content tools, online event registration, and much more!
similar_products.features: Our affordable and easy to use software can streamline your member-based organization's administrative processes; retain and grow your membership; and generate revenue. Our intuitive association management features can help you track dues; communicate and engage with members and prospects; update your website; host in-person events and virtual events with our Zoom interface; conduct calls for proposals; track donations; integrate with QuickBooks; manage committees; and more. Try a free demo!

similar_products.short_desc: Gym membership management software with payment processing, Integrated Websites, virtual training, scheduling, automation & more.
similar_products.features: Our comprehensive, membership management software provides everything you need to turn your passion into a successful business. With payment processing & auto-billing, lead-generating websites + digital marketing, virtual classes, scheduling, retail, automation, member & staff apps, in-depth reporting & more, you have everything required to grow, nurture & retain your members.

similar_products.short_desc: Used by organizations to manage their memberships, integrate their other SaaS platforms, & automate their critical tasks.
similar_products.features: Join It is a membership management service that enables organizations to effectively keep track, manage, and grow their community. At our core, we provide a simple database and dashboard interface for organization leaders to monitor developments in their membership. We then integrate this database context with best in class service providers to automate other essential components of an organization, like payment processing, email communication, and event organization.

similar_products.short_desc: Mindbody wellness business management software is tailored to businesses that need business and membership management systems.
similar_products.features: Mindbody empowers your members to own their wellness experience. From member profiles and automated reminders to self check-in, your all-in-one software will keep everyone moving. Plus, with a custom app, members can update their info and schedule on the go?from the comfort of your brand. Manage and grow your community with ease. Schedule your free demo today.

similar_products.short_desc: SmartRec by Amilia is the smartest and easiest way to offer, manage, and sell activities. Engage communities online effortlessly.
similar_products.features:
Amilia SmartRec empowers businesses, community organizations and Parks & Recreation agencies to better serve their community with activities.  

We make it easy for your community to find, register and pay for activities online. You'll save time and get to do more of what you love - it's eCommerce for activities!  

When your registration process is simple and effortlessly accessed by your community, you'll generate even more engagement. Not to mention, you'll see a huge bump in signups.

similar_products.short_desc: Our gym and fitness studio membership management system is the all-in-1 place to manage your daily admin tasks & increase revenue.
similar_products.features: Our gym and fitness studio membership management software gives you an all-in-1 place to manage your daily admin tasks & increase revenue. Enhance your member's experience with a mobile app they can use to book classes, make purchases and engage with your studio. With our website schedule integrations, make sure your members can easily find and view your class schedule. We also provide a check-in kiosk which will free up time before a class for you to engage with your members and prospects.

similar_products.short_desc: Manage memberships & waivers, get booked 24/7, seamlessly process payments, send marketing emails & run reports. Starts at $25/month.
similar_products.features: Use our all-in-one membership management software & app to manage and grow your business. Get booked & paid 24/7. Stay safe with 100% contactless check-in & checkout. Advertise your virtual and in-person classes on the Vagaro Marketplace. Reduce no-shows with automated reminders. Manage classes and memberships on any device. Send waivers and forms. Vagaro Pro is the most downloaded/reviewed Apple & Android App. Prices start @ $25/month. Sign up for a Free 1 Month Trial.

_source.short_desc: Simplify membership management with MemberClicks! Trusted by over 3,000 member-based organizations who love our client service!
_source.long_desc:
Simplify membership management with MemberClicks! Our all-in-one solution helps your association, chamber, or association management company engage your members and increase revenue. Make use of powerful features to save time, grow your membership, generate more revenue, improve communication, build your community, and understand your members.  

Over 3,000 member-based organizations in North America trust MemberClicks to fulfill their missions.
_source.pricing_details: Pricing is based on the number of member profiles in your database.  We offer both monthly and annual payment options.  For more details, see the link to our pricing page above.
_source.target_audience: Midsized associations and chambers of commerce (staff of 2-20), and AMCs use MemberClicks to engage members, grow revenue, save time, and reduce stress.

media.caption: Main Dashboard - A high level overview of your association and activity
Payment Management - payments, invoicing & payment processor details
Events & Financials Dashboard - Easily see upcoming and historical information in one easy-to-use solution
Job Board - Build membership value and generate revenue through a branded job board
Exceptional Customer Support - Reach us by phone, live chat, email and our 24/7 video and help sections

category_features.name: Compliance Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage non-adherence to policies in a service, product, process, or supplier behavior

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and access client/customer contracts

category_features.name: Grant Application Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the status of grants throughout the application lifecyle

category_features.name: Grant Award Tracking
category_features.definition: Track grant submission requirements, deadlines, and financial documentation for awarded grants

category_features.name: Grant Discovery
category_features.definition: Automatically search funding sources and alert uses when grant opportunities arise

category_features.name: Fundraising Management
category_features.definition: Activities related to raising money for a specific cause

category_features.name: Volunteer Management
category_features.definition: Manage volunteer information and direct volunteer resources

related_products.short_desc: Apply empowers organizations to seamlessly collect, manage and review grant applications and drive better, faster funding decisions.
related_products.features: Move towards your mission, faster. Create a frictionless grantmaking process with SurveyMonkey Apply (formerly known as FluidReview). Seamlessly collect and review applications online, save time with robust automations, gain insights with powerful reports, and more. Special non-profit pricing is available.

related_products.short_desc: Streamline financial processes and demonstrate accountability with Blackbaud Financial Edge NXT's complete fund accounting system.
related_products.features: Blackbaud Financial Edge NXT delivers unparalleled cloud-based financial management capabilities to keep you compliant with grant reporting standards while helping you streamline your operations. With Financial Edge NXT, capture and monitor grant activity and financials while demonstrating accountability to increase grant renewals. Ensure funds are properly allocated, track and report financial activity from any device with 24/7 accessibility.

related_products.short_desc: SmarterSelect provides a comprehensive, yet easy-to-use, online application management solution for scholarships, grants, awards, etc.
related_products.features: With an over 95% customer retention rate and over 98% customer satisfaction rate, SmarterSelect provides a comprehensive, yet easy-to-use, online application management solution for scholarships, grants, awards, fellowships, data collection, etc.  Create, collect, analyze, and evaluate applications using our mobile-responsive user interface, text message notifications, inline calculations, dynamic application rules, online recommendations, file uploads, and much, much more.

related_products.short_desc: Grants Network modernizes grants management for state, local and tribal governments through SaaS technology.
related_products.features: Grants Network is modernizing grants management for state, local, and tribal governments. The system provides a unified process and portal to search for, track, and administer funding across entire local or state jurisdictions. Whether youre managing an award or a recipient, Grants Network simplifies the entire process and streamlines communication. Grantors can create and track grant solicitations while grantees can track and report on projects all in one centralized system.

related_products.short_desc: Launch, manage, measure, and grow your grants and social impact programs with Submittable's intuitive, flexible cloud-based platform.
related_products.features: Submittable powers you with tools to launch, measure, and grow your social impact programs, locally and globally. From grants and corporate social responsibility programs to awards and scholarships. The start-to-finish platform makes your workflow smarter and more efficient, leading to better decisions and bigger impact. Easily report on success, and learn for the future-Submittable is flexible and powerful enough to grow alongside your programs.

related_products.short_desc: The most flexible and configurable platform for full-cycle program management, supporting grantmakers at mission-based organizations.
related_products.features: Informed, effective, and equitable grantmaking requires more than cookie-cutter software. Zengine by WizeHive is the most flexible solution for grantmakers, providing full lifecycle solutions, tailored workflows, engaging experiences, and invaluable impact analysis and reporting dashboards. Integrates with GuideStar, Salesforce, and 2000+ other systems. Powering some of the world's most heroic missions, including those of leading foundations, CSR programs, universities, and government programs.

related_products.short_desc: Cultivate strong funder relationships and track deadlines, deliverables, and revenue through the grant lifecycle with EveryAction.
related_products.features: Utilize modern, state-of-the-art workflows to identify and research prospective funders, track deadlines and documents throughout the grant lifecycle, and analyze results. EveryAction's powerful, unified nonprofit CRM enables nonprofits of all sizes to cultivate strong funder relationships and easily track communications, deliverables, and revenue throughout the grant process. Built and supported by nonprofit fundraisers, EveryAction is built to increase efficiency and help you raise more money.

related_products.short_desc: Manage your entire nonprofit with a single CRM! Get all the functionality you need, plus donation webpages & build-in email marketing.
related_products.features:
Manage your entire nonprofit with a single CRM! Choose the Add-on options you need, including Memberships, Case Management, Grant Management and more to create a solution tailored for your exact needs.

Sumac also offers donation webpages, build-in  email marketing tools, and it integrates with your accounting software.

If you manage unique programs and services, Sumac has a Custom Add-on that we'll configure to meet your exact needs,

related_products.short_desc: Track incoming and outgoing grants, stay on top of reporting requirements, and manage the entire grant cycle.
related_products.features: If you are a grant-making or grant-seeking organization, you need to track and manage a myriad of detailed information throughout the grant process. Exceed Beyond ensures that all aspects of the process are thoroughly accounted for and on schedule. Our Grant Management application empowers you to save time, be more productive, and get exceptional value while streamlining the grant process.

related_products.short_desc: A single cloud-based solution designed for financial planning, expense management, accounting, and transactions.
related_products.features: Workday Financial Management is a single cloud-based financial planning, accounting, and transactions solution. By combining transactions, accounting, analytics, and always-on audit in one system, Workday empowers decision-makers with in-the-moment and on-the-go financial and business insight they can act upon and plan for what's next.

related_products.short_desc: GrantHub for Grantseekers is a grant management solution designed to save you time while increasing your grant funding success
related_products.features: GrantHub for Grantseekers helps you find funders and grants, as well as track and organize all your deadlines, applications, reports, and important grant documents. Instead of using a mix of manual methods and tools (spreadsheets, task manager, calendar, file storage systems. etc.) GrantHub will streamline the creation of your application and proactively send out email reminders when deadlines are coming due. Grant consultants can also use GrantHub to track grants for multiple clients.

similar_products.short_desc: Launch, manage, measure, and grow your grants and social impact programs with Submittable's intuitive, flexible cloud-based platform.
similar_products.features: Submittable powers you with tools to launch, measure, and grow your social impact programs, locally and globally. From grants and corporate social responsibility programs to awards and scholarships. The start-to-finish platform makes your workflow smarter and more efficient, leading to better decisions and bigger impact. Easily report on success, and learn for the future-Submittable is flexible and powerful enough to grow alongside your programs.

similar_products.features: Informed, effective, and equitable grantmaking requires more than cookie-cutter software. Zengine by WizeHive is the most flexible solution for grantmakers, providing full lifecycle solutions, tailored workflows, engaging experiences, and invaluable impact analysis and reporting dashboards. Integrates with GuideStar, Salesforce, and 2000+ other systems. Powering some of the world's most heroic missions, including those of leading foundations, CSR programs, universities, and government programs.

similar_products.short_desc: Grant Management Software to Help You Achieve Your Mission. Maximize Outcomes. Meet Performance Standards. Increase Compliance.
similar_products.features: AmpliFund is the leading purpose-built grant management platform designed for organizations ranging from government entities to nonprofits, to educational institutions to manage every phase of the grant management process. Our configurable solution provides a full suite of features needed by grant funders and recipients to maximize grant outcomes, meet performance standards, increase compliance, and achieve their missions.

similar_products.short_desc: Fluxx Grantmaker makes grantmaking and impact reporting easy. Request a demo today.
similar_products.features: Fluxx Grantmaker provides the most complete set of features designed solely for grantmaking - collaboration tools, budgeting and forecasting, grantee engagement, reporting, storytelling, and more - out of the box as part of the base solution. Grantmaker enables data-driven grantmaking via a cloud-based, mobile-optimized platform. Powered by the Fluxx Data CoreTM, Grantmaker fosters collaboration, knowledge transfer, and continuous learning that drives impact for funders and their grantees.

similar_products.short_desc: Foundant GLM is a powerful online grantmaking solution, with an intuitive platform, and guaranteed dedication to clients success.
similar_products.features: Foundant Technologies leads the industry in solutions tailored specifically to support philanthropy. More than 1500 grantmakers use Grant Lifecycle Manager (GLM) - an intuitive platform suitable for users at any technological level. Specializing exclusively in the philanthropic sector, Foundant has dialed in what it means to provide exceptional customer service and support with Client Success Managers dedicated to and trained in client success.

similar_products.short_desc: Submit.com's feature-rich yet easy-to-use secure online platform delivers organisations one seamless grant management solution.
similar_products.features:
Submit.com's Grant Management Software is the most flexible on the market that will adapt to your current grants management process and grow and expand with you.

Feature-rich yet easy-to-use secure online platform delivers organizations one seamless Grant Management solution for the entire grants lifecycle. 

Create and personalize applications, manage all of the back-end administration and review, and take care of reporting, process, and impact, all from one location.

similar_products.short_desc: Fully customizable, all-in-one cloud-based grant management platform to launch, manage, measure, impact report and grow.
similar_products.features: CommunityForce Grant Management Software is the philanthropy industry's leading cloud-based all in one grants platform, enabling users to prospect, collaborate, report and analyze in real time. Integrations with Salesforce and 100+ other systems, powering some of the world's most heroic missions, including those of leading foundations, CSR programs, universities, and government programs, with data-driven grantmaking. Join the 100+ non profits using the best in class grants management software!

similar_products.short_desc: Powerful fundraising and supporter management tools which help you work more efficiently and bring in more money for your mission.
similar_products.features: With Blackbaud Grantmaking, benefit from an open grantmaking software platform that integrates with your other business solutions while still providing an intuitive user experience. Sign in from any device, anywhere, on any browser, making it easy for staff to manage the grants workflow or share important grant management information anytime. Effortlessly setup online application forms for review from anywhere for faster approval. See how Blackbaud can add value to your organization.

similar_products.short_desc: The Optimy grant management solution coordinates all of your applications in one place in a concise and easy-to-view dashboard.
similar_products.features: Mission-driven companies deserve a customer-focused solution to manage grants across all stages of the life cycle. Optimy's grant management software enables you to receive and select grants applications to better serve the ones you are trying to help and at the same time to manage and report on your impact to those who offer their support. With Optimy, you get a personalised service, we believe in human interaction and put it in the centre of our work.

similar_products.short_desc: Good Grants is a grantmaking platform that helps grantmakers around the world affordably accept, manage and fund grant applications.
similar_products.features:
Good Grants is an internationalised grantmaking platform that helps small to medium-sized grantmakers around the world affordably accept, manage and fund good grant applications, their way.

Designed for grantmakers who have outgrown manual processes and spreadsheet program management, Good Grants offers an attractive alternative to overpriced grantmaking software. 

Good Grants empowers grantmakers to manage the entire grant lifecycle, streamline processes and optimise funding, online.

similar_products.short_desc: GrantHub for Grantseekers is a grant management solution designed to save you time while increasing your grant funding success
similar_products.features: GrantHub for Grantseekers helps you find funders and grants, as well as track and organize all your deadlines, applications, reports, and important grant documents. Instead of using a mix of manual methods and tools (spreadsheets, task manager, calendar, file storage systems. etc.) GrantHub will streamline the creation of your application and proactively send out email reminders when deadlines are coming due. Grant consultants can also use GrantHub to track grants for multiple clients.

similar_products.features: With an over 95% customer retention rate and over 98% customer satisfaction rate, SmarterSelect provides a comprehensive, yet easy-to-use, online application management solution for scholarships, grants, awards, fellowships, data collection, etc.  Create, collect, analyze, and evaluate applications using our mobile-responsive user interface, text message notifications, inline calculations, dynamic application rules, online recommendations, file uploads, and much, much more.

similar_products.short_desc: InfoStrat's Grants Manager Plus is a Microsoft Dynamics 365-powered grant management solution that simplifies the entire grant process.
similar_products.features: InfoStrat's Grants Manager Plus provides grantors with an all-in-one, integrated solution that simplifies the grants process from initial solicitation through review, scoring, award, payment processing and post award reporting.
